title: Practice-Based Smoking Cessation Intervention Competency Enhancement Program for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and clinical experience
context.additional_context: Blended educational environment combining smartphone-based mobile learning platforms with offline workshops. Operating a real-time feedback system centered on formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 85% accuracy in applying smoking cessation intervention protocols through scenario-based practical assessments.
Learners can reduce clinical judgment errors by 40% compared to baseline when designing personalized smoking cessation strategies.
Learners can perform self-directed competency diagnostics at least twice a week using digital assessment tools (mobile quizzes).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
